publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3875 Stuart McMillan: Award Winning Kirkintilloch Canal Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the Kirkintilloch Canal Festival for winning the prestigious British Urban Regeneration Association award for recreation and tourism; notes that this win recognises the record-breaking year for the Kirkintilloch Canal Festival in 2008; further notes that the awards aim to recognise best practice in sustainable waterway regeneration and development; also notes that the Kirkintilloch Canal Festival is the biggest of its kind in East Dunbartonshire, and wishes this year’s festival, which takes place on 29 and 30 August 2009, all the success of last year. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Jackie Baillie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Aileen Campbell*, Elaine Smith*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-3875 Award Winning Kirkintilloch Canal Festival (lodged on 6 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3875 Award Winning Kirkintilloch Canal Festival (lodged on 6 April 2009) Gil Paterson*
